Guard Kelios:
Would you like to hear about the mission again? Explaining again isn't difficult.
As a proof, collect Destroyed Gargoyle Fragments from the Hunter Gargoyle, Basilisk Scales from Tarlk Basilisk and Elder Tarlk Basilisk, and Mahum ID Tags from the other Mahum monsters.
Upon completing the mission, you must report that you have completed the mission to Captain Mouen in the Town of Oren.
